 2024-08632024-07-05PMO
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of ANN MCCAIN EVANS, C.M., of St. Andrews, New Brunswick, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as an ad hoc provincial member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of ANN MCCAIN EVANS, C.M., of St. Andrews, New Brunswick, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as an ad hoc provincial member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
